item.description:
Axiational Light Grid: The Hue-Man Blueprint

Presentation by Aimee Carruth

Aimee Carruth is a near death survivor, and “returned” synesthetic, an ability that has allowed her to “hear” with her hands when she touches an object or person.

That event, and the resulting aftereffects brought her to be one of the founding members of the NIH - NCCAM, as a patient advocate, and to be a speaker at the United Nations SRC. Aimee is an author ("Facts are Beliefs, made Solid") a lecturer on NDE survivor issues, a medical intuitive, psychic, and consultant to scientists MD's, and psychiatrists.

Aimee is known internationally as a teacher and practitioner of the Axiatonal Light Grid System, written about in the Keys of Enoch (J.J. Hurtak…”The Academy for Future Science”) as being the Blueprint for Human Beings.

Please see her web site for more information www.eLighten.org

We meet from 11:30 am - 1:30 pm. Potluck lunch and conversation is from 11:30 am - 12:30 pm. Presentation is from 12:30 - 1:30 pm.

Let us know what you'll bring for the potluck when you RSVP.
item.how_to_find_us: I will welcome you at the front door
item.name: March Boston Area Mind-Body Therapies Meetup
